name: Elevator Pitch (Xin)
description:
Assignment of a random prompt created in 1 day on Spring 2020

In a sad future, there is a game related to love. What is it?

In the future, people tend to make friends virtually and consume a lot of virtual products. They forget how to interact in the real world. Two people are stuck in the elevator for hours and they start to interact with each other, but awkwardly they start to love each other.

In this prototype, the puzzle becomes the main part of the story, because people start communicating very hard, same as solving a difficult jigsaw puzzle. There is no win or fail, but to complete or give up.
